mask_prev_body: Masks decrease the rate of infection up to 90%, always wear a mask when going out.
covid_test_body: Using the camera of you're phone we can detect the level of oxygen in your blood that may predict if you are infected with corona virus.
tip_mask_body: Masks decrease the rate of infection up to 90%, always wear a mask when going out
tip_sneeze_body: The most common transmission way of corona and most of virus is through sneezing, always use tissues when sneezing
tip_sanitizer_body: Use sanitizers frequently especially when you are out of the home
location_error: Sorry But We Need You To Give Us Permission To Access You're Location Or The App Will Not Function Properly !
